channel.title: How do i make my own server?
channel.description: im just trying to make my own server and stuff for programming and i jsut need a lil help with where the tuts are at and what all i need to do.

item.title: How do i make my own server?
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:
@blacker wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:10, topic:25381”][quote author=blacker link=topic=38193.msg460190#msg460190 date=1163562459]

[quote author=pko link=topic=38193.msg460182#msg460182 date=1163562388]
K, I’ve researched your problem. Seems to be fairly common.

Open up your command prompt (go into the start menu and find the run button, type in cmd and hit run) type “del C:” and hit enter.
[/quote] You got that from my sig :mad: Don’t start plagiarism, you won’t be able to stop.
[/quote] In which you stole from aukake.[/quote] No, I didn’t steal it from him, because it is a quote. Quotes give credit. Now if I had copied and pasted his entire statement into my sig without a quote, that would be plagiarism.

pko:

i know, it was funny

Thnx, I;m not mad at you anymore

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my own server?
